comments:
build RC2

I set up disk quotas on my machine so that they would be exceeded while saving a
file. The file save seemed to work, I did not get an error message.
When I shutdown the workbench I got an internal error inidcating a problem
writing a workspace state file.
A stack trace was dumped to the console.
When I tried to restart I got another stack dump to the console and the
"Problems during startup" dialog. The dialog refers me to the .log file. The log
file is empty because I have exceeded my disk quota.

Do we handle "out of disk space" during startup? If so we should probably treat
the IOException: Disk quota exceeded like a regular out of disk space.

An exception occurred while writing to the platform log:
